Body: I would imagine that it would need a full list of all the forms of all the words, but how much information would need to be told to the computer about each word in order for it to know enough to judge if sentences are, say, valid English?
Title: What does a dictionary need so that a computer can use it to determine the grammaticality of a given string?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: trying to learn and help others learn :)
